## Checklist

**Code quality:**
- [ ] Code follows PEP 8 style guidelines
- [ ] Code formatted with `black`
- [ ] Linted with `ruff`
- [ ] Type hints added where appropriate
- [ ] Docstrings added/updated (Google style)

**Documentation:**
- [ ] README.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] Relevant docs/ files updated
- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] CITATION.cff updated (if data sources changed)

**Data integrity:**
- [ ] Data provenance documented
- [ ] Data sources cited properly
- [ ] No copyrighted/proprietary data added without license
- [ ] Data quality checks passed
- [ ] Not applicable (no data changes)

**Reproducibility:**
- [ ] Changes reproducible in `nix develop` environment
- [ ] Dependencies updated in `pyproject.toml` (if needed)
- [ ] flake.nix updated (if new system dependencies)
- [ ] Instructions in REPLICATION_GUIDE.md still accurate
